entries.headline: Legal Issues Cleared - RB1 Status Confirmed
entries.content: Won't face ANY charges and will return to Cleveland soon. Clear RB1 for Browns.

entries.headline: Will Play First 4 Weeks
entries.content: Expected to play the first 4 weeks of the season. Disciplinary hearing with NFL scheduled for Sept 30th.

entries.headline: Signs with Browns - Legal Cleared
entries.content: Just signed with Browns. No indictment issued. Was projected Day 2 pick before allegations made him UDFA.

entries.headline: Steelers Inquiring About Trade
entries.content: Commanders received calls from Steelers inquiring about Terry McLaurin. Pittsburgh desperately needs another legit WR.

entries.headline: Likely NOT Healthy for Week 1
entries.content: Reports suggest he'll start 2025 on the PUP list. Emeka Egbuka's stock rising.

entries.headline: Hamstring Injury in Practice
entries.content: Injured hamstring in practice, went to trainers. Walked off under own power but worth monitoring.

entries.headline: Going Nuclear in Practice Daily
entries.content: Actually going nuclear in practice every single day. Might hit 1,200+ yards this year.

entries.headline: Looking Sharp in Practice
entries.content: Looked really sharp in practice this week. Stacking training camp reps with impressive throws.

entries.headline: Sharp Practice Performance
entries.content: Looked really sharp in practice this week with highly impressive throws.

entries.headline: Increased Pass-Catching Role
entries.content: Will be utilized significantly more in a pass catching role this season.

entries.headline: Oblique Strain - May Miss Sunday
entries.content: Suffered oblique strain in practice. May miss Sunday's game. NFL debut was most watched preseason game in 10 years (2.2M viewers).

entries.headline: Coach: 'Can Have It All'
entries.content: Mike Macdonald: 'Can have it all, he can do everything... so committed to being a great QB, which he's going to be.' Promising Week 1 preseason outing.

key_takeaways: Judkins cleared legally and confirmed as CLE RB1
Rice available for first 4 weeks before potential suspension
Godwin likely PUP, boosting Egbuka prospects
Williams showing elite practice performance in DET
McLaurin trade rumors to Pittsburgh gaining traction
